title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: BLOODLUST & CARNIVAL OF SOULS

sources.title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: BLOODLUST & CARNIVAL OF SOULS
sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD.Features a menu with either poster art or still photo from one of the movies and audio. Easy to burn instructions: Download zipped folder, open it, extract the VIDEO_TS folder and burn to disc, that's the easiest way. I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed on this site.. This disc features BLOODLUST & CARNIVAL OF SOULS as well as the preview and intermission reels.Enjoy the show!
